title: Modern 1 Canal Pair Villas
description: A luxurious pair of 1 Canal villas designed with symmetry, clean lines, and smart zoning. Each home features sustainable systems, high ceilings, and modern landscaping.
challengesOvercome: Synchronizing construction timelines for both villas while maintaining design symmetry and privacy.

title: Modern 5 Marla Home
description: A compact and efficient 5 Marla house that embraces modern aesthetics with energy-saving lighting, minimal d√©cor, and multipurpose spaces.
challengesOvercome: Maximizing functionality in limited space with custom-built furniture solutions.

title: Modern 5 Marla Residence
description: This 5 Marla residence combines style and space-efficiency. Designed with a focus on airflow and natural lighting using sleek, vertical glass facades.
challengesOvercome: Navigated high-density zoning regulations and introduced creative ventilation solutions.

title: Compact Modern 5 Marla House
description: A smartly-designed home with automation and integrated storage, ideal for small families valuing function and elegance.
challengesOvercome: Addressed sunlight issues by redesigning facade orientation for better daylight capture.

title: Modern 7 Marla Family House
description: An open-layout modern house with artistic interior design and maximum space usage. Designed for urban families looking for style and comfort.
challengesOvercome: Constructed on a slope, requiring terracing and reinforced retaining walls.

title: Sleek 7 Marla Modern Villa
description: A sleek modern house with artistic exterior cladding and seamless indoor-outdoor transition. Perfect for high-end modern living.
challengesOvercome: Managing water drainage on a narrow plot required custom piping design.

title: Modern 10 Marla House
description: A contemporary 10 Marla home featuring minimalistic design, open-plan living spaces, and energy-efficient systems. Designed for urban comfort with smart home integration and premium materials.
challengesOvercome: Tight urban space required custom foundation work and smart space planning.

title: Stylish 10 Marla Residence
description: A stylish 10 Marla house combining elegance and technology. Designed with a modern layout, rooftop entertainment area, and automated systems.
challengesOvercome: High humidity in the area required moisture-resistant material choices.
